sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { toast } from 'react-toastify'; const AppointmentBooking = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ doctor_id: '', appointment_date: '', time_slot: '', reason: '', symptoms: '', priority: 'normal' }); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); // Mock data for demonstration const mockDoctors = [ { id: '1', first_name: 'Dr. John', last_name: 'Smith', specialization: 'Neurology', experience_years: 10 }, { id: '2', first_name: 'Dr. Sarah', last_name: 'Johnson', specialization: 'Radiology', experience_years: 8 }, { id: '3', first_name: 'Dr. Michael', last_name: 'Brown', specialization: 'Neurosurgery', experience_years: 15 } ]; const timeSlots = [ '09:00', '10:00', '11:00', '14:00', '15:00', '16:00' ]; const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setLoading(true); // Simulate API call setTimeout(() => { toast.success('Appointment request submitted successfully! You will receive a confirmation once the doctor approves.'); setFormData({ doctor_id: '', appointment_date: '', time_slot: '', reason: '', symptoms: '', priority: 'normal' }); setLoading(false); }, 2000); }; return (

Book Appointment

{/* Booking Form */}
Appointment Details
Providing detailed information helps the doctor prepare for your visit.
{/* Sidebar Information */}
{/* Selected Doctor Info */} {formData.doctor_id && (
Selected Doctor
{(() => { const selectedDoctor = mockDoctors.find(d => d.id === formData.doctor_id); return selectedDoctor ? (
{selectedDoctor.first_name} {selectedDoctor.last_name}

{selectedDoctor.specialization}

{selectedDoctor.experience_years} years experience
) : null; })()}
)} {/* Appointment Guidelines */}
Guidelines
  • Arrive 15 minutes before your appointment
  • Bring all relevant medical records
  • List current medications
  • Prepare questions for the doctor
  • Bring insurance information
{/* Emergency Contact */}
Emergency

For medical emergencies, call:

911

For urgent questions:

(555) 123-4567
Available 24/7
); }; export default AppointmentBooking;
